text: Truth sits upon the lips of dying men.
author: Matthew Arnold

text: You can't keep changing men, so you settle for changing your lipstick.
author: Heather Locklear

text: Neutral men are the devil's allies.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

text: I think men are afraid to be with a successful woman, because we are terribly strong, we know what we want and we are not fragile enough.
author: Shirley Bassey

text: Stronger by weakness, wiser men become.
author: Edmund Waller
